title: FY Representatives
about: Elevate Your Potential with CSI-KJSCE as a First-Year Representatives. Engage actively in dynamic college council activities, gaining hands-on experience in event management, industrial relations, teamwork, and community outreach. Our council prioritizes excellence, seeking exceptional individuals who are ready for a unique opportunity. We are dedicated to your personal and professional growth, imparting skills that empower your industry success and personal development. Join CSI-KJSCE, where every day is a chance to learn, lead, and excel, positioning you ahead of your peers in all-round skills. Your brighter future starts here.
responsibilities: Be the voice of first-year students, facilitating communication between the council and peers.
Embrace opportunities to learn about event management, corporate relations, and teamwork.
Contribute to planning and executing council events, including coding-related activities and workshops.
skills: Enthusiasm and curiosity for expanding knowledge.
Problem-solving proficiency and a different perspective.
Proactive initiative and versatility in diverse teams.
Fundamental Coding Aptitude and a desire to learn.
perks: Networking with peers, seniors, and mentors.
Skill enhancement in coding, problem-solving, and management.
Leadership roles in organizing major events.
Internship accreditation for dedicated work within the council.
procedure: Shortlisting based on Submitted Resumes and Form Question responses [Top 40 Shortlisted]
15-20 minute offline interviews with the Top 40 selected from Round 1, based on various aspects [Top 6 Shortlisted]
Faculty interviews with the Top 6 selected FY Reps from Round 2 to finalize the selection [Top 6 Finalized]
resume: Research to understand what we are looking for because the best candidate is someone who understands what the recruiters want. Read the Job Description.
Get familiar with resumes and their significance in the recruitment process. Watch this informative video [Here] to learn more.
To excel in the initial resume-based round, create a comprehensive resume that effectively highlights your achievements. Check this Resume Guide [Here].
Make use of user-friendly resume templates available on Canva, Overleaf, etc. Explore some templates [Here].
Create your resume using the chosen template, review and meticulously proofread your resume to present yourself in the best possible light to us.
Please make sure your Resume Google Drive or Docs link is public and not private, try opening the link in incognito mode to check if it is accessible.
openings: 6 First Year Representatives for the Academic Year 2023-24
